front.title: Compilation of list of relevant site reports

author.organization: Stanford Research Institute (SRI) International, Augmentation Research Center (ARC), ARPA Network Information Center

abstract.t: The Network Information Center is working to compile a list of all Site-produced reports which are of interest to Network participants. Reports procuced under ARPA IPT contracts and any other relevant reports produced by the Sites on information processing, network planning, the hardware and sorfware for the projects, and some general reports on the subject concerns of individual Sites, are being identified, to be listed and acquired for the Network Information Center collection.
